post.text: As secretary of state, Hillary restored our reputation around the world and made us safer.

comment.author: Nathaniel
comment.text: Many of these acts are why I'm proudly voting for you, HRC, but I hope you will consider the legitimate and hard pushback you are getting for acts in Honduras and Libya supporting so much regime change as a conscious approach to leadership when in reality it results in devastation for so many. Please do better going forward and I hope you won't make me regret throwing in behind you so hard. Where are you on #nodapl #waterislife ?? We need your voice! Be On the right side of history! Speak out! We believe in you!! Believe in us!

replies.author: Alexander
replies.text: Equality for women must logically mean prison for Hillary. Without a Trump presidency you democrats will never be able to nominate an honest candidate. DRAIN THE SWAMP!

replies.author: Nathaniel

replies.author: Alexander
replies.text: I love the weak responses when they know I'm right!
